entry.title: Congressman Torres Calls for Investigation Into SEC Over its Approach to Crypto
entry.summary: Congressman Ritchie Torres has asked for two separate independent investigations of the U.S. Securities Exchange Commission (SEC) for its "haphazard and heavy-handed approach to digital assets."

entry.title: XRP Overtakes BNB to Become 4th Largest Cryptocurrency; Funding Rates Surge
entry.summary: XRP's knocked out BNB as the 4th largest crypto by market cap, after its value surged more than 60% after a partial victory against the SEC.

entry.title: Ex-Celsius CEO Alex Mashinsky's Bail Set at $40M, Travel Restricted
entry.summary: The founder of the bankrupt crypto lender has pleaded not guilty to charges including fraud and manipulation of the CEL token.

entry.title: XRP flips BNB for first time in 2 years after court ruling
entry.summary: XRP is once again the fourth most valuable crypto after a healthy rally inspired by Thursdayâ€™s positive ruling

entry.title: Google Play Changes Policy on Tokenized Digital Assets, Allowing NFTs in Apps and Games
entry.summary: Google Play announced a major shift in policy today, allowing developers to incorporate digital assets such as NFTs into their apps and games in the store. Companies that decide to offer the ability to buy, sell or earn tokenized assets will be required to make it clear in the Play Console that there are blockchain-based elements in the app.

entry.title: Stablecoins Pose 'Existential Threat' to Policy Sovereignty, Says India Central Bank Official: Report
entry.summary: "If large stablecoins are linked to some other currency, there is a risk of dollarization," RBI Deputy Governor Rabi Sankar has said.

entry.summary: The committee sought input from the cryptocurrency industry to better understand the tax challenges presented by digital assets.

entry.title: Bitcoin NFTs Back in Spotlight as Ordinals Cross 350K Daily Inscriptions
entry.summary: Bitcoin Ordinals, a method of generating non-fungible tokens (NFT) through a process called inscribing, debuted in January, bringing the NFT and smart contract narrative to the Bitcoin blockchain.

entry.title: Bitcoin No Longer Correlated to U.S. Stocks, Crypto Analytics Firm Block Scholes Says
entry.summary: The 90-day rolling correlation between bitcoin and Nasdaq, S&P 500 is now at the lowest level observed since July 2021, according to data tracked by crypto derivatives analytics firm Block Scholes.

entry.title: SEC Has No Jurisdiction Over Cryptos on Coinbase, Exchange Says in Lawsuit Response
entry.summary: U.S. crypto exchange Coinbase claimed that digital assets listed on its platform fall outside the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission's (SEC) purview in its first legal response to the regulator's lawsuit. The SEC sued Coinbase at the beginning of June, alleging that a dozen of the cryptocurrencies offered through its wallet or trading platforms were unregistered securities. In its answer, filed early Thursday, Coinbase claimed that these cryptos are not investment contracts and therefore are not securities.

entry.summary: What is not to like about the tiny Swiss city where Vitalik Buterin and his cofounders launched Ethereum? The No. 1 spot on CoinDeskâ€™s Crypto Hubs 2023 ranking has it all: regulatory clarity, crypto-friendly banks and a lively crypto job market and events calendar.

entry.summary: A fintech hub turned early crypto adopter, Singapore raised billions through ICOs. Cue parties on yachts and at luxury villas. entry.title: Abu Dhabi: A Wealthy Middle-East Capital Creating a Bridge From TradFi to Crypto
entry.summary: The heart of crypto in the capital of the United Arab Emirates is actually just offshore in the Abu Dhabi Global Markets, an economic free zone. With a mandate to encourage fintech, the No. 6 spot in CoinDeskâ€™s Crypto Hubs 2023 keeps the lines of communications open between regulators and crypto institutions.

entry.title: Wyoming: Regulatory Clarity and Crypto-Friendly Banks Fuel Blockchain Revolution
entry.summary: Americaâ€™s least populous state has passed three dozen laws regulating crypto. entry.title: Silicon Valley: The Mecca for Venture Capital May Be Cooling on Crypto
entry.summary: The storied birthplace of the U.S. tech industry is dripping with talent and money. But crypto founders who live in the No. 8 spot on CoinDeskâ€™s Crypto Hubs 2023 list say that Web3 is losing ground to artificial intelligence in the race to capture the Valley's wallets and minds.

entry.summary: The spread has flipped negative with consistent institutional selling of ether calls. Some of these positions could be rolled over ahead of Friday's expiry, leading to captivating shifts in volatility, crypto exchange Deribit said.

entry.summary: While other industries like entertainment and loyalty programs have the potential to onboard millions of new users into Web3, gaming provides fertile ground for the seeds of mass adoption. And while there are nearly 8 billion people in the world, over 3 billion of us play video games pointing to a considerable amount of the population primed for a gamified digital future.

entry.title: Hinman Documents Release in SEC-Ripple Case Is a Boost to Ether: JPMorgan
entry.summary: The documents are likely to intensify the move among major cryptocurrencies to become more decentralized and look more like ether, the report said.

entry.title: Meme Coin BOB Tanks 45% After Elon Musk Calls its Twitter Bot Account a 'Scam'
entry.summary: Musk had previously engaged with the Bob token bot several times, aiding a value rise.
